allow: Bash(git -C "D:\\Dev\\p.osgi.ds" add CLAUDE.md com.kk.pde.ds.imp/META-INF/MANIFEST.MF com.kk.pde.ds.app/META-INF/MANIFEST.MF distribution/pom.xml distribution/p2.product)

Bash(git -C "D:\\Dev\\p.osgi.ds" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix OSGi bundle resolution and product configuration

- Make org.osgi.service.component.annotations import optional in bundle manifests
  - These are compile-time only annotations, not needed at runtime
  - Fixes bundle resolution errors when running the product

- Add maven-antrun-plugin to fix config.ini bundle paths
  - Tycho generates paths without ../plugins/ prefix
  - Post-process config.ini in verify phase to add correct paths
  - Regenerate product archives with fixed configuration

- Update CLAUDE.md with correct run command
  - Add -configuration configuration flag requirement
  - Document that flag is needed for OSGi framework to find config.ini

- Update p2.product formatting \(auto-generated by Eclipse PDE\)

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "D:\\Dev\\p.osgi.ds" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add comprehensive .gitignore for Maven Tycho project

- Ignore Maven/Tycho build outputs \(target/, archives\)
- Ignore IDE-specific files \(Eclipse, IntelliJ, VS Code\)
- Ignore OS-specific files \(.DS_Store, Thumbs.db\)
- Ignore Claude Code local settings
- Ignore OSGi runtime artifacts
- Ignore logs and temporary files

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "D:\\Dev\\p.osgi.ds" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''

Bash(git -C "D:\\Dev\\p.osgi.ds" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Migrate target platform from p2 to Maven dependencies

- Replace Eclipse p2 repository references with Maven Central coordinates
- All OSGi bundles now sourced from Maven:
  - org.eclipse.platform:org.eclipse.osgi \(3.22.0\)
  - org.eclipse.platform:org.eclipse.equinox.console \(1.4.800\)
  - org.apache.felix:org.apache.felix.scr \(2.2.12\)
  - org.apache.felix:org.apache.felix.gogo.* \(command, runtime, shell\)
  - org.osgi:org.osgi.service.component \(1.5.1\)
  - org.osgi:org.osgi.util.function/promise
  - org.osgi:org.osgi.service.component.annotations \(1.5.1\)
- Use explicit versions instead of p2 version wildcards \(0.0.0\)
- Set missingManifest=error for OSGi bundles \(all have proper manifests\)
- Eliminates dependency on Eclipse p2 update sites

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
